narrative:
This was the first pre-license inspection of site 003, Mall at Chestnut Hill, of this applicant for a USDA Class "C"
license.  There were not any non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
 
An exit briefing was conducted with a facility representative.  The applicant will send the license fee directly to the
Eastern Regional Office.  No USDA regulated activities may be conducted until the license has been issued.
